verses.name: Luke 1:71
verses.text: That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;

verses.name: Luke 1:72
verses.text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant;

verses.name: Luke 1:73
verses.text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham,

verses.name: Luke 1:74
verses.text: That he would grant unto us, that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear,

verses.name: Luke 1:75
verses.text: In holiness and righteousness before him, all the days of our life.

verses.name: Luke 1:76
verses.text: And thou, child, shalt be called the prophet of the Highest: for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;
